name: Highlights
description:
Highlights is a visual novel about a young adult who had a falling out with many loved ones due to depression. In the game, you decide what key points to bring up in a conversation in hopes of mending different relationships.

Estimated Gameplay Time:

8-9 minutes

Note:

I didn't dedicate as much time to this submission as my first one because finals are this week haha. I hope you enjoy this short little game.
